channel.title: Flexy UI Components on Flexy Components Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Flexy UI Components on Flexy Components Documentation

item.title: Button
item.description: Buttons are one of the most common and basic user interface elements.

item.title: Slider
item.description: A slider allows quickly selecting a value from a range. Common uses include seeking through audio or video, changing a volume level, or setting values in image editors.

item.title: Switch
item.description: Switches can be used for controlling features, settings or hardware that have a clear on/off logic.
